info.name: Insecam :: Dark Night Watcher. Black Theme Style.
info.description:
A Dark Skin / Black Theme for the Insecam site

• Easy on the eyes
• Continuous development
• Browse improved to see all results without scrolling down

Any questions / issues / bugs / suggestions, write in comments below with a description.
Education is always appreciated.
Visit my other styles if you wish.
info.additionalInfo:
[Version 1.1]
• Still dark as the night.
• Minor fixes in the layout
• Theme updated for all domains and languages

[Version 1.0]
• This skin is born, finally see... the dark.
